nodes.text: The Widows of Alderaan Educational Consortium was an educational organization from the planet Alderaan that was active during the reign of the New Republic. It sponsored the Baobab Merchant Council's compilation of the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, which was written by the Human scholar Ebenn Q3 Baobab in 6 ABY.
The Widows of Alderaan Educational Consortium was first mentioned in the 2001 Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, which was written by Ben Burtt.
